topics.body:
My pc meets the minimum requirements for far cry 3, evil within and watch_dogs but all three of those games run like shit. It doesn't meet the minimum requirements for shadow of mordor and that game runs just fine. 

I have no idea what is going on here. Bad optimization maybe? I know bethesda and ubisoft don't exactly have the best reputation for that.
topics.author: 500b587e7f123b1f230014a9

topics.author: 500b587e7f123b1f230014a9

topics.body:
"@Too_Offensive":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5489e2386368723d0e2e0100#post_5489e2386368723d0e2e0100
I know watch dogs had a massive shit storm about that actually.  Console players kept whining about how pc always gets better graphics and such so they intentionally fucked up the pc version of watch dogs hard just to appease console fans.  Honestly it still kind of pisses me off to this day cause they intentionally made a shit port just to appease console fans crying about how it's "unfair" that pc always played better.

It'd be like if the next Crysis came out and when you installed it and played it looked like something made from the 90's cause people were complaining about how it was "unfair" that it looked "too good" on other platforms and wouldn't stop until they nerfed everything about the game to make it "fair".
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600
